Detailed Description

Base class for a TTEthernet-Application based on the TTEthernet-API.

The class contains the wrappers for the C to C++ Mapping.

Warning:
Please note that the TTEthernet-API functionality is not yet completely implemented
See also:
TTEAPITestApplication, TTEApplicationBase

Definition at line 71 of file TTEAPIApplicationBase.h.

Member Function Documentation

void TTEthernetModel::TTEAPIApplicationBase::handleMessage ( cMessage *  msg  )  [private, virtual]

Handles incoming START_APPLICATION or Scheduler messages.

The module receives START_APPLICATION messages that trigger startApplication() or messages via schedulerIn that contain Tasks to be executed.

Parameters:
msg the incoming message

00468 int32_t TTEAPIApplicationBase::tte_get_buf_var(const tte_buffer_t * const buf,
00469                                    const tte_buf_var_id_t var_id,
00470                                    const uint32_t var_size,
00471                                    void * const value){
00472     Enter_Method_Silent();
00473     TTEAPIPriv *priv = (TTEAPIPriv*)buf->priv;
00474     switch(var_id){
00475         case TTE_BUFVAR_RECEIVE_CB:{
00476             APICallback *cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getReceiveCallback(this));
00477             if(cb == NULL){
00478                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00479             }
00480             void (*func)(void *) = cb->getFunctionPointer();
00481             memcpy(value, &func, sizeof(void (*)(void *)));
00482             break;
00483         }
00484         case TTE_BUFVAR_TRANSMIT_CB:{
00485             APICallback *cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getTransmitCallback(this));
00486             if(cb == NULL){
00487                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00488             }
00489             void (*func)(void *) = cb->getFunctionPointer();
00490             memcpy(value, &func, sizeof(void (*)(void *)));
00491             break;
00492         }
00493         case TTE_BUFVAR_CB_ARG:{
00494             APICallback *cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getReceiveCallback(this));
00495             if(cb == NULL){
00496                 APICallback *cb = dynamic_cast<APICallback*>(priv->buffer->getTransmitCallback(this));
00497                 if(cb == NULL){
00498                     return ETT_NULLPTR;

00201 int32_t TTEAPIApplicationBase::tte_get_var(const uint8_t ctrl_id,
00202                                                             const tte_var_id_t var_id,
00203                                                             const uint32_t var_size,
00204                                                             void * const value){
00205     Enter_Method_Silent();
00206     switch(var_id){
00207         case TTE_VAR_LINK_STATUS:{
00208             cModule *phy = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", 0);
00209             if(phy){
00210                 for(int i=0;i<phy->getVectorSize();i++){
00211                     EtherMACFullDuplex *mac = (EtherMACFullDuplex*)getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", i)->getSubmodule("mac");
00212                     if(mac->gate("phys")->isConnected())
00213                         *((uint8_t*)value) = *((uint8_t*)value)<<1 | 1;
00214                     else
00215                         *((uint8_t*)value) = *((uint8_t*)value)<<1;
00216                 }
00217             }
00218             else{
00219                 *((uint8_t*)value) = 0;
00220                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00221             }
00222             break;
00223         }
00224         case TTE_VAR_CTRL_STATUS:{
00225             *((uint32_t*)value) = TTE_STAT_CONFIGURED | TTE_STAT_RUNNING;
00226             if(synchronized){
00227                 *((uint32_t*)value) |= TTE_STAT_SYNCHRONIZED;
00228             }
00229             break;
00230         }
00231         case TTE_VAR_CTRL_COUNT:{
00232             *((uint8_t*)value) = 1;
00233             break;
00234         }
00235         case TTE_VAR_CHANNEL_COUNT:{
00236             cModule *phy = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", 0);
00237             if(phy){
00238                 *((uint8_t*)value) = phy->getVectorSize();
00239             }
00240             else{
00241                 *((uint8_t*)value) = 0;
00242                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00243             }
00244             break;
00245         }
00246         case TTE_VAR_TIME_RESOLUTION:{
00247             cModule *scheduler = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler", -1);
00248             if(scheduler){
00249                 *((tte_time_t*)value) = scheduler->par("tick").doubleValue();
00250             }
00251             else{
00252                 *((tte_time_t*)value) = 0;
00253                 return ETT_NULLPTR;
00254             }
00255             break;
00256         }
00257         case TTE_VAR_API_VERSION:{
00258             *((uint32_t*)value) = TTE_API_VER;
00259             break;
00260         }
00261         case TTE_VAR_THREAD_SAFE:{
00262             //TODO: CHECK WHETHER IT IS POSSIBLE TO SET TO TRUE (1)
00263             *((uint8_t*)value) = 0;
00264             break;
00265         }
00266         case TTE_VAR_MAC_ADDRESS:{
00267             uint8_t *valueArr= (uint8_t *)value;
00268             cModule *phy = getParentModule()->getSubmodule("phy", 0);
00269             if(phy){
00270                 EtherMACFullDuplex *mac = (EtherMACFullDuplex*)phy->getSubmodule("mac");
00271                 MACAddress macAddress = mac->getMACAddress();
00272                 //Change order
00273                 valueArr[5] = macAddress.getAddressByte(0);
00274                 valueArr[4] = macAddress.getAddressByte(1);
00275                 valueArr[3] = macAddress.getAddressByte(2);
